Partecipato come relatore - International TICCIH Conference: "TICCIH2000", Londra, UK

Partecipato come relatore - XII International Congress:"The Transformation of old Industrial centres and the Role of Industrial Heritage", Moscow-Ekaterinburgh-Nighny Tagil, Russia

Partecipato come relatore - 4th EPUK Conference: "Putting research in practise", Glasgow, UK
